messages.subject: UNIQUE SWORD FOUND IN ENGLAND
messages.msgSnippet: Dear People, Check this out: http://www.northantset.co.uk/viewarticle.aspx?sectionid=1117&ArticleID=1580775 Whilst it isn t strictly Japanese it does have some
messages.messageBody:
Dear People,

Check this out:

http://www.northantset.co.uk/viewarticle.aspx?sectionid=1117&ArticleID=1580775

Whilst it isn't strictly Japanese it does have some impact on the technical study of how swords were forged in ancient times. As such it is of great interest to me and I apologise if isn't grist for the mill of most of you.

Regards,

Barry Thomas.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
